title: How do I withdraw cash using my GCash VISA/Mastercard Card?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [What can I do with my GCash VISA/Mastercard Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017730834-What-can-I-do-with-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-Card)
- [How can I order a GCash VISA Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286702730265-How-can-I-order-a-GCash-VISA-Card)
- [Can GCash deliver my GCash Card to my location?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21043404386585-Can-GCash-deliver-my-GCash-Card-to-my-location)
- [How do I withdraw cash using my GCash VISA/Mastercard Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017595494-How-do-I-withdraw-cash-using-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-Card)
- [GCash Card Fast FAQS](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21907534783769-GCash-Card-Fast-FAQS)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To withdraw cash using your GCash Card, follow the steps below:

Before withdrawing, ensure your GCash wallet has enough balance to cover **both the amount you want to withdraw and the ATM withdrawal fee.**

1. Go to any BancNet ATM
2. Insert your GCash Card
3. Enter your **6-digit ATM PIN** (this is the same PIN you set for your GCash Card, but different from your GCash MPIN)
4. Choose your withdrawal amount

### **Withdrawal Limits:**

- **Single Withdrawal Limit**: Maximum amount of **PHP 20,099** per transaction
- **Daily Withdrawal Limit**: Maximum amount of **PHP 40,099** per day

Note:

Your withdrawal limit resets every day at 12:30 AM. For example, if you reach your limit at 11:00 PM, you can withdraw again after 12:30 AM.

### **ATM Fees:**

ATM transaction fees are set by the ATM provider. Always check the ATM screen for the exact fees before proceeding. Below are BSP-approved rates:

- **Withdrawal Fee**: PHP 10 - PHP 18
- **Balance Inquiry Fee**: PHP 0 - PHP 2.50

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I pay using my GCash Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004214883-Pay-using-your-GCash-card)
- [How much are the fees and transaction limits for my GCash Card?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286810141977-GCash-Card-Withdrawal-Fees-and-Transaction-Limits)
- [The ATM did not release any money after withdrawing using my GCash Card](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287261434009-The-ATM-did-not-release-money-after-my-GCash-Card-Withdrawal)
- [I can’t withdraw using my GCash Card. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287254658585-Can-t-withdraw-using-GCash-card)
- [My GCash Card got stuck in the ATM. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30287216824601-My-GCash-Card-is-stuck-in-the-ATM)
